articles.title: Zydus Lifesciences buyback 2024: Check share repurchase price, record date and other details - ET Now
articles.description: Zydus Lifesciences buyback 2024: The board of Zydus Lifesciences has approved to repurchase 59.7 lakh equity shares, which represents 0.59% of the company's total paid-up equity capital via the tender offer route. Check Zydus Lifesciences share repurchase pri…
articles.content: The shareholders, who have shares of the company as of the record date, will be eligible to participate in the buyback. (Image: Company's website/ET NOW News)

articles.title: FPIs continue Jan's selling streak, offload ₹3075 crore in Indian equities - Mint
articles.description: FPIs have sold  ₹3,075 crore worth of Indian equities and the total inflow stands at  ₹12,590 crore as of February 9, taking into account debt, hybrid, debt-VRR, and equities
articles.content: Foreign portfolio investors (FPIs) started February on a positive note but took a U-turn on global cues and continued January's selling streak in Indian markets. FPIs turned massive sellers in Januar… [+4842 chars]

articles.title: Interim and special dividend: Whopping 5000% payout announced by Nifty50 company; check record date - ET Now
articles.description: Interim and Special Dividend: The company has announced  dividend of 5000 per cent or Rs 100 per equity for the current fiscal year.
articles.content: Dividends are typically paid regularly, such as quarterly or annually, depending on the company's dividend policy. (Image: istock/ET Now News)
